title: This is the place you've been looking for! 1 BD / 1 BA!
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 1001 sq ft | $1560/Month', 'IMT Uptown Post Oak', '1111 POST OAK BLVD', 'Houston, TX 77056', 'show contact info', 'Description:', '**Choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT Uptown Post Oak is a well-established community located in the desirable area of Uptown Houston, Texas.', "Simply put, IMT Uptown Post Oak is the Houston apartments you've been dreaming of.", "Located minutes away from the Houston's iconic Gerald D. Hines Waterfall Park, our apartments are centered in the business district along Post Oak Boulevard and Westheimer Road.", 'Just west from the heart of Downtown District, you will have no problem finding great shopping, dining and entertainment.', 'IMT Uptown Post Oak features luxury studio, one, and two bedroom apartment homes that are all beautifully appointed.', 'Each kitchen is fully equipped with microwave oven, frost-free refrigerator, dishwasher and disposal.', "You'll also enjoy the luxury of having both a washer and dryer inside of every apartment home.", 'Have your choice of over two dozen floorplans, all with high-end finishes including stained concrete on second-floor homes.', 'Granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, extra high ceilings and oversized Roman bathtubs are standard.', 'Whether you want a quiet night at home or a night out in the trendy Uptown Houston, IMT Uptown Post Oak is the home for you.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!',
